hadiths.text: Narrated Ja'far bin Muhammad : Narrated from his father who said: "Al-Hasan and Al-Husain wore their ring on their left hand." This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي لُبْسِ الْخَاتَمِ فِي الْيَمِينِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Wearing The Ring On The Right Hand
